item.description:
Keith and Donna are opening up their home in Haverhill for an afternoon of game playing.

We have the following games:

Boggle (Travel Edition)
Cards
Checkers
Chess
Chinese Checkers
Encore
Go
Mancala
Mastermind
Monopoly
Newshound
Phase 10
Pictionary
Scrabble
Settlers of Catan (2 & 6 players)
Strat-O-Matic Baseball
The Simpsons Ultimate Trivia Game
Trivial Pursuit Genus 5
Trivial Pursuit 1990's Edition


Things to bring: Any favorite games. There will be snacks and drinks, but anyone is welcome to bring their own favorites.

Specific details: We have two cats and a dog. The cats will be kept in a bedroom. Our dog is a big baby and would cry all afternoon if we left him in a bedroom too. :-) So, be aware there is a friendly dog wandering the house.

Parking is available anywhere on the street.

Those who RSVP "yes" will get an e-mail that week with the specific address and directions.

Currently, "maybe" RSVPs are allowed, but if your RSVP is not updated by April 23, your RSVP will be changed to "no."

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Games in Haverhill
